title: T206 Griffith ($27) and few other cheap Tcards

posts.post_title: T206 Griffith ($27) and few other cheap Tcards
posts.post_content:
Purchased these somewhat recently and am keeping Lundgren. The others are listed below 

T206 Griffith - $27
T207 Tannehill - $9
T205 Richie -$9

Take all three for $42 and shipping is on me with group purchase. 

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=237850[/url]

Prices are for PayPal FF, or check or MO if I know you. 

Kindly add $2.75 for shipping unless you buy all three cards then shipping is free. 

Thanks for looking
Scott
